flawed_nl_solution:
Jeff donated 30/100*300 = <<30/100*300=90>>90 pencils.
He remained with 300-90 = <<300-90=210>>210 pencils.
Vicki had twice as many pencils as Jeff, meaning he had 2*300 = <<2*300=600>>600 pencils.
When Vicki donated 3/4 of his pencils, he gave away 3/4*600= <<3/4*600=2400/3>>2400/3 pencils.
Vicki remained with 600-2400/3=<<600-2400/3=-200>>-200 pencils.
Together, Jeff and Vicki remained with -200+210 = <<-200+210=10>>10 pencils.
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 450, not 2400/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
